projects.title: Chatify
projects.info: Chatify is a web chat application featuring real-time communication with one-to-one and group chat functionality. It includes authentication, authorization for group admins, and uses Cloudinary for image storage.

projects.title: NetflixGPT
projects.info: NetflixGPT is a Netflix clone with integrated GPT search capabilities for faster search results and multi-language support. Deployed on Firebase, it offers enhanced scalability for a large user base.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.info: The URL Shortener compresses lengthy URLs into concise, memorable links. It includes authentication, authorization, custom short URLs, and link expiration/deactivation features.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.info: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.
